name: Mosaic Replica
description:
This is a independent case study, where I decided to make a replica of a featured game on itch.io called "Mosaic" created by "sunil" and "Corey Hardt"

(This project was permitted by the developer sunil)

Things to improve on : add ability system , fix a bug where the enemy spawn on the same tile as the player

To play the original version please use the following link

https://zunil.itch.io/mosaic

Thank you
